name: synapse-constants
description: This is an npm package that maintains all synapse constants

scripts.compile-esm: tsc --target es2018 --outDir esm && copyfiles -u 1 "constants/assets/**/!(*.ts)" esm/constants && webpack
scripts.compile-cjs: tsc --module commonjs --outDir dist&& copyfiles -u 1 "constants/assets/**/!(*.ts)" dist/constants && webpack
